item.title: Some Tips of Express.js
item.description: Parsing POST data Start from Express 4.16 app.use(express.json()) app.use(express.urlencode({extended: true})) // app.use(express.multipart()) // security concerns? // URL encoding // POST: name=foo&color=red // or JSON encoding // POST: {"name": "foo", "color": "red"} app.post('/url', (req, res) => { // your POST data is req.body var name = req.body.name }) Express 4.0 to 4.15 npm install --save body-parser and var body_parser = require('body-parser') app.use(body_parser.json()) app.use(body_parser.urlencode({extended: true}))
